verses.verse: But Job<WH347> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>,
Hear<WH8085> diligently<WH8085> my speech<WH4405>, and let this be your consolations<WH8575>.
Allow<WH5375> me that I may speak<WH1696>; and after<WH310> that I have spoken<WH1696>, mock on<WH3932>.
As for me<WH7879>, is my complaint to man<WH120>? and if it were so<WH7307>, why should not my spirit be troubled<WH7114>?
Mark<WH6437> me<WH8074>, and be astonished, and lay<WH7760> your hand<WH3027> upon your mouth<WH6310>.
Even when I remember<WH2142> I am afraid<WH926>, and trembling<WH6427> takes hold on<WH270> my flesh<WH1320>.
Therefore do the wicked<WH7563> live<WH2421>, become old<WH6275>, Yes<WH1396>, are mighty in power<WH2428>?
Their seed<WH2233> is established<WH3559> in their sight<WH6440> with them<WH6631>, and their offspring before their eyes<WH5869>.
Their houses<WH1004> are safe<WH7965> from fear<WH6343>, neither is the rod<WH7626> of God upon them<WH433>.
Their bull<WH7794> breeds<WH5674>, and fails<WH1602> not<WH6510>; their cow calves<WH6403>, and casts not her calf<WH7921>.
They send forth<WH7971> their little ones<WH5759> like a flock<WH6629>, and their sons<WH3206> dance<WH7540>.
They take<WH5375> the tambourine<WH8596> and harp<WH3658>, and rejoice<WH8055> at the sound<WH6963> of the organ<WH5748>.
They spend<WH3615> their days<WH3117> in wealth<WH2896>, and in a moment<WH7281> go down<WH2865> to the grave<WH7585>.
Therefore they say<WH559> unto God<WH410>, Depart<WH5493> from us<WH2654>; for we desire not the knowledge<WH1847> of your ways<WH1870>.
What is the Almighty<WH7706>, that we should serve<WH5647> him<WH3276>? and what profit should we have<WH6293>, if we pray unto him?
Behold<WH2898>, their good is not in their hand<WH3027>: the counsel<WH6098> of the wicked<WH7563> is far from me<WH7368>.
How often is the candle<WH5216> of the wicked<WH7563> put out<WH1846>! and how often comes<WH935> their destruction<WH343> upon them<WH2505>! God distributes sorrows<WH2256> in his anger<WH639>.
They are as stubble<WH8401> before<WH6440> the wind<WH7307>, and as chaff<WH4671> that the storm<WH5492> carries away<WH1589>.
God<WH433> lays up<WH6845> his iniquity<WH205> for his sons<WH1121>: he rewards<WH7999> him<WH3045>, and he shall know it.
His eyes<WH5869> shall see<WH7200> his destruction<WH3589>, and he shall drink<WH8354> of the wrath<WH2534> of the Almighty<WH7706>.
For what pleasure<WH2656> has he in his house<WH1004> after<WH310> him<WH4557>, when the number of his months<WH2320> is cut off in the middle<WH2686>?
Shall any teach<WH3925> God<WH410> knowledge<WH1847>? seeing he judges<WH8199> those that are high<WH7311>.
One dies<WH4191> in his full<WH8537> strength<WH6106>, being wholly at ease<WH7946> and quiet<WH7961>.
His breasts<WH5845> are full<WH4390> of milk<WH2461>, and his bones<WH6106> are moistened<WH8248> with marrow<WH4221>.
And another dies<WH4191> in the bitterness<WH4751> of his soul<WH5315>, and never eat<WH398> with pleasure<WH2896>.
They shall lie down<WH7901> alike<WH3162> in the dust<WH6083>, and the worms<WH7415> shall cover them<WH3680>.
Behold<WH3045>, I know your thoughts<WH4284>, and the devices<WH4209> which you wrongfully imagine against me<WH2554>.
For you say<WH559>, Where is the house<WH1004> of the prince<WH5081>? and where are the living<WH4908> places<WH168> of the wicked<WH7563>?
Have you not asked<WH7592> them that go<WH5674> by the way<WH1870>? and do you not know<WH5234> their tokens<WH226>,
That the wicked<WH7451> is reserved<WH2820> to the day<WH3117> of destruction<WH343>? they shall be brought forth<WH2986> to the day<WH3117> of wrath<WH5678>.
Who shall declare<WH5046> his way<WH1870> to his face<WH6440>? and who shall repay<WH7999> him what he has done<WH6213>?
Yet shall he be brought<WH2986> to the grave<WH6913>, and shall remain<WH8245> in the tomb<WH1430>.
The clods<WH7263> of the valley<WH5158> shall be sweet<WH4985> unto him<WH120>, and every man shall draw<WH4900> after<WH310> him<WH4557>, as there are innumerable before him<WH6440>.
How then comfort<WH5162> you me in vain<WH1892>, seeing in your answers<WH8666> there remains<WH7604> falsehood<WH4604>?
